name: Pathogen (itch) (paddyt)
description:
Controls

WASD - Movement

Mouse Wheel - Zoom In / Out (careful with this)

F - Carry resources / Drop resources

Tab - Open Inventory menu

LMB / RMB / Q / E - Abilities

Esc - Pause

Description:

Simple top-down shooter with multiple upgrades to choose from throughout the game
